title: 用Vanilla JS(including ES6)整下啲console programs都幾方便...

replies.msg:
尋晚browsed下網版Eloquent JavaScript(3rd Edition), 去到Data Structures: Objects and Arrays個chapter(http://eloquentjavascript.net/04_data.html), 見到個作者整咗個journal入data, 然後玩埋correlation coefficient嚟做data analysis, 好鬼過癮, 忽發奇想, 個journal(係個array of objects嘅data structure嚟)用嚟入accounting entries咪仲正!
結果自己無無聊聊咁整咗個叫做可以入accounting data然後出個靚靚仔仔嘅journal listing嘅一個journal program出嚟:

P.S. 估唔到咁快整到出嚟, 不過個program只能出到single company per program, 要出到multiple companies per program嘅話就要用到classes, constructor functions or factory functions呢啲比較難駕馭嘅JS features, 遲啲有時間先再研究點砌, 哈!
